lekhakayada athuluwa oba apa boho deneku min pera purna suraya grahanayaka athdakim laba nathi namuth 55 siduwu surya grahanayedi athdakim labu apage wadihitiyan pawasana paridi ema mathakayan hasyajanaka menma bhayanaka ha sanukampitha swarupayak dara atha.rupawahiniya nothibu ekala madhya keshathraya sampurnayenma piriwasa thibune guwan widuliya ha jathika puwathpath kihipayak pamani.purna surya grahana welawedi wadakaha mishritha aushadha panayakin rupa sobhawa ha smarana shakthiya wadigara gatha haki bawa madhya kihipayakinma janathawa wetha paniwudayak labuni.ada kalayatath wada paramparika gathi pawathum thiba ekala sitiyawun niyamitha mathrawan ganawath sitha balimak nomathiwa bath kannak, the bonnak men surya grahana welawedi wadakaha kannata bonnata wuye wadipura rupa sobhawak ha wadi smarana shakthiyak laba ganime abhilashaya athiwaya.namuth prathipalaya wuye lankawa purama rohal piri ithiri yana ayurin wadakaha biwu janathawa bade ajirna, una sannipatha ,pachanaya ,wamanaya wani rogawalata lak wimaya.jiwitha kihipayak ahimi wu bawatada wartha wi atha.
